title: Why do people gather when others die? - Quora

response.answer_text: Please, Read 7 habits of most effective people and if you can also find the Audio, do the exercises given in the book, you surely would have experiential understanding about it. Why people gather when other dies? One of my professors at CUNY gave us the audio tape, I practiced the exercises and understood what you asking in the question. Search Google and youtube. I think I need to re-read that book again. Thanks
